Since there was a question at http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4016216/Monopoly_2008_(Installer___No_CD_Patch)_ONLY_25_MB  regarding file size difference I'm posting the answer here too:

Well, Slickinators version is a whole ISO CD image it contains some big dummy files the game uses to determine if it's running an original CD - these are not needed if you install a "no-cd patch" anyway so why waste bandwidth? I only took what's needed - game installer and "patch" (I made installer to "patch" too - it auto-finds the game from registry and installs patched exe - no need to copy file manually). Whew :P

Ok where the instructions say to copy the file called "no CD patch", you don't just copy the file in to the directory, you extract the files in that folder into C:Program Files/Hasbromonopoly and then run the game and it works fine, thanks.

Game is easy to install but didnt quite work on my 40inch tv because there's no resolution settings so 16.9 users advise binoculars needed, 

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

use a virtual drive program, i use daemon tools but there are others as well. Mount the image and install the game, then go to my computer and right click on the drive and explore. there will be a folder called nocd crack open it drag the rar file onto desktop and extract onto desktop ( note winrar needed for extraction of .rar file) then cut the exe not the shortcut lol into your programs folder in the C:\ drive its under the name Hasbro  and paste it in the folder it will overwrite the original exe now you can play it without cd hope this is usefull :)
